_sText: Hosties_Jail_Mars by: siXMan & Zathain Purpose: This is primarily a prison break map with less restricted gameplay, but it can also be played for hosties. Key Features: -10 prison cells, 1 V.I.P. cell -Two secret vents -Solitary Confinement -Big Cage -Airlock ejection (for executions) -Healing room -Bath/Shower room -Armory with many weapons -Gun cell, flashbang cell Have fun!
